go-sgd
======

Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) for golang

Loss Functions
--------------
- **Linear**
- **Logistic**
- Hinge

Learning Schedule
-----------------
- **Linear**
- [Bach and Moulines 2001] (http://hal.archives-ouvertes.fr/docs/00/60/80/41/PDF/gradsto_hal.pdf)
- AdaGrad
- [No More Pesky Learning Rates] (http://arxiv.org/abs/1206.1106)

Regularization
--------------
- L1 Norm
- L2 Norm
- ElasticNet
